ThingDef.label: Isolinear Datachip
ThingDef.description: A mysterious ancient optical data storage device marked with an unfamiliar emblem. Build a Jury-Rigged Datachip Reader and complete the Mandelbrot Cipher I research project to unlock its secrets.

ThingDef.label: Isolinear Backup Module
ThingDef.description: A mysterious ancient optical data storage device encased in a rugged housing and marked with an unfamiliar emblem, which has somehow survived millennia entombed in a collapsed ancient bunker. Build a Jury-Rigged Isolinear Computer and complete the Mandelbrot Cipher II and II research projects to decode its contents.

ThingDef.label: Isolinear Computing Assembly
ThingDef.description: An array of high-density optical data storage and computational modules mounted in a rack. Used to construct Isolinear Mainframes and other facilities requiring the highest level of data processing capability.

ThingDef.label: Isolinear Computing Module
ThingDef.description: A high-density optical data storage and processing module. Used to construct facilities requiring rapid, localized data storage and retrieval.

ThingDef.label: Isolinear Processor
ThingDef.description: A high-density optical computational module. Used to construct facilities requiring advanced data extrapolation and processing capabilities.
